lines: 1. When He comes When He comes, We shall see the Lord in glory when He comes! As I read the gospel story, We shall see the Lord in glory We shall see the Lord in glory when He comes!
Refrain : With the alleluias ringing to the sky, With the alleluias ringing to the sky! As I read the gospel story, We shall see the Lord in glory

2. When He comes, When He comes, We shall hear the trumpet sounded when He comes! We shall hear the trumpet sounded, See the Lord by saints surrounded, We shall hear the trumpet sounded when He comes!
Refrain : With the alleluias ringing to the sky, With the alleluias ringing to the sky! We shall hear the trumpet sounded See the Lord by saints surrounded
3. When He comes, When He comes, We shall all rise up to meet Him when He comes! We shall all rise up to meet Him. When He calls His own to greet Him We shall all rise up to meet Him when He comes!
Refrain : With the alleluias ringing to the sky, With the alleluias ringing to the sky! We shall all rise up to meet Him When He calls His own to greet Him With the alleluias ringing to the sky!
